## Low efforts
```{ojs}
//| echo: false
data = FileAttachment("synthese.csv").tsv({typed: true});
Inputs.table(data.filter(d=>d.Condition == "Low effort"), {
	columns: [
		"Study",
		"Indices",
		"Tres",
		"Reference",
		"AUC",
		"Sen",
		"Spe",
		"PPV",
		"NPV"
	],
	sort: "AUC",
	reverse: true
})
```
